entity.speialties: Business Software, Developer Tools, Home & Educational Software, Tablets, Search, Advertising, Servers, Windows Operating System, Windows Applications & Platforms, Smartphones, Cloud Computing, Quantum Computing, Future of Work, Productivity, AI, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Laptops, Mixed Reality, Virtual Reality, Gaming, Developers, and IT Professional

posts.text: Are we amid a burnout epidemic? Some experts say we are.Here are four tips for establishing healthy boundaries from our WorkLab Guide: https://msft.it/6041jg3yh
Shoutout to the coworkers who refuse to schedule Friday afternoon meetings. 💙
Say goodbye to “access denied.”How to freely collaborate and co-create with your teams and partners via Microsoft Teams Connect: https://msft.it/6045j5165
Technology doesn’t exist without innovation and innovation doesn’t exist without inclusive thinking.Inside the HBCU Experience celebrating our next generation of tech leaders at The World Games 2022:

Employing an effective hybrid strategy can help your team work seamlessly whether you’re apart or in-person. To crack the code on virtual collaboration, check out our guide to the four hybrid work modes: https://msft.it/6046jZbfm

Technology is intertwined with education, yet 1.3 billion students worldwide lack internet access leading to lower GPAs and digital skills deficits.How our latest learning kit is focused on equity with online-ready devices: https://msft.it/6040jk9QA
Sometimes the quietest person in the room has the most to contribute.
Take a moment to celebrate your wins. 💯

Feels surreal to be interviewed by Microsoft, and talk about growing up, coming out, war, social justice and how it happened that I help organize Pride here. Mom, dad, check it out!Much humbled and very blushing. Everything we do is always a work of a collective, and never of a single person. So thankful for all of you, who make this company and this world better every day and have patience to teach me valuable lessons along the way.So humbled by your kind words and mentorship of these years, Eli Friedman and your passion and perseverance against all odds Eileen Mikloiche. Thank you for agreeing to be interviewed for this article.  Huge thank you to our GLEAM community and of course - to Microsoft Life team.https://lnkd.in/g9_H82E2#microsoftlife #pride #team
Did you know we're spending 2.5x more time in meetings than two years ago? 🤯

From increasing collaboration and personalization to streamlining lessons, a Microsoft Showcase School in Texas is redefining the classroom experience. How Microsoft 365 and Surface devices can shape the future of learning: https://msft.it/6047jRmUL

Ready to inspire collaboration among your team without adding more to your plate? Learn more about how our new Microsoft Teams features help personalize and make meetings more inclusive: https://msft.it/6045juWIZ
Collaboration can be tricky. Luckily, there are tools to help your team work, however you work. Here's our expert guide: https://msft.it/6001jP05P

Ralph Highnam designed AI software to screen for breast cancer after witnessing the impacts of disease firsthand. Discover how the Microsoft Azure cloud powers Volpara Health’s lifesaving program: https://msft.it/6043jPQGh

To combat against waterborne pathogens, Sentient Hubs use real-time data to inform machine learning and modeling. Discover how deployment on Microsoft Azure powers conservation efforts in Australia: https://msft.it/6044jMgEw
Remember that great ideas can come from anyone in the room.

Enhance your digital workforce with tools designed with every role and function in mind. The latest in our Microsoft 365 updates include:• 🤝Viva sales integration with CRM systems to deepen customer connections• 📅 A booking page in Outlook to streamline meeting requests• 🔒 Enhanced security control in Microsoft Endpoint Manager to empower IT teamsCheck out more updates that will help streamline virtual work: https://msft.it/6045jzUBt

When it comes to security, we all have to work together. By combining the powers of attack, defense and mitigation experts, the MORSE approach is unlike any other in the industry and will transform cybersecurity. Discover how our approach drives innovation through collaboration: https://msft.it/6047jzYHN

Say hello to GODEL, a new pretrained language model that combines conversation with task-oriented dialog using context and external information. How this open-source model will advance conversational AI research: https://msft.it/6002jKoSI
Your daily reminder that being OOO means that you can truly disconnect from work.

Volt Energy is a Black-owned solar energy development company creating career pipelines for students from HBCUs to increase diversity in the green energy sector. Discover how they are empowering the next generation of leaders: https://msft.it/6047jJmBZ

Nearly 15% of the global population has a disability and yet their needs often aren’t addressed in development agendas. We teamed up with The World Bank and Fordham University to create the Disability Data Hub that will:✔️ Engage with the disability community✔️ Be accessible✔️ Offer data analysisCheck out how this resource will address the divide:  https://msft.it/6044j1hAA
We're the one always searching for snacks. 🍪 Comment your working style below!

Guess what’s back, back again. 😉📅 Mark your calendars for an all-new, reimagined #MSIgnite! Explore the latest innovations, learn from product experts and partners, level up your skillset, and create connections from around the world.🎉Learn more 🔗: https://msft.it/6047jEKlN

Just announced - Microsoft FY22 Q4 Earnings   Revenue: $51.9 billion ⬆️ 12%; 16% CC  Operating income: $20.5 billion ⬆️ 8%; 14% CC  Net Income: $16.7 billion ⬆️ 2%; 7% CC  EPS: $2.23 ⬆ 3%; 8% CC  Read the full earnings release here: https://lnkd.in/e7rNx6PT  Note about Forward-Looking Statements in earnings post: https://aka.ms/MSFT_FLS
Whether it's hybrid, remote, or in the office, tell us how you make flexible work, work for you. 👇https://msft.it/6048jB8SK
Did you know Māui dolphins are one of the rarest and most threatened species? Here's how MAUI63 uses Microsoft technology to protect the near-extinct population: https://msft.it/6003j603D

We need to go from talking about digital transformation to delivering on the digital imperative for every organization. Here’s a clip of Satya Nadella’s message to our partner ecosystem this week at #MSInspire.
Routines keep us motivated and grounded. Share your routine and how it sets you up for success!

Excited to share Microsoft’s very own clothing collection, Hardwear, developed in partnership with designer and creator Gavin Mathieu. Mathieu was first introduced to design through Microsoft Paint and credits the tool for being a foundation in his career. An incredible story on the ways technology can inspire creativity and empower communities. #Microsoft #fashiontech #innovation

Autonomous aircraft require in depth training and testing - that’s where our new tool, Project AirSim comes in. Discover how Azure powers the future of autonomous flight with data: https://msft.it/6008b7Q0j

Our digital skillset initiatives will prepare the global workforce for the 97 million new jobs that are set to emerge over the next three years. How we provide equal access to upskill trainings to people from diverse backgrounds: https://msft.it/6048bfFQy

Are you the boss of your own time?With 10,080 minutes in a week, it's important to make each of them count. Learn from our CVP of Modern Work Jared Spataro about the timeboxing method. https://msft.it/6000bfL1p

From reducing aircraft ground time to streamlining the purchase of tickets, a focus on improved customer service is underway in the travel industry. Explore the Microsoft solutions at the core of these innovative changes: https://msft.it/6043bfDqB
The journey is just as much of the process as the end-goal. ✅

The employee experience needs to be prioritized —beginning with onboarding. Here's how Microsoft Entra Verified ID streamlines and simplifies the onboarding process, setting up new hires for success: https://msft.it/6048b4zVi

Gen Z is set to be the most entrepreneurial generation yet, with 62% indicating they have started or plan to start a business. Which trend do you think will shape the future of business?1. ⏰ The end of the 9-to-52. 😇 Investments in social causes3. 🔒 Reduced focus on data security4. 🏖 Goal of early retirement5. 📱 Turning to social media for business adviceComment below and read more on the Gen-trepreneur Z mindset ⬇https://msft.it/6048b4EAA

Learning is not one-size-fits-all and thanks to advancements in AI technology it no longer has to be.Here's how Eedi, an online math tutoring platform powered by AI, takes a custom approach to education by helping students overcome misconceptions and increase their confidence: https://msft.it/6042bNFSk

National security and technology are intertwined. 🤝That’s why we’ve teamed up with the Naval Postgraduate School on Project Athena to improve Department of Defense research. More on this collaborative project and how it drives discovery for our nation’s leaders: https://msft.it/6048b22IC
Have 5 minutes? Here are some things you can do:🥤 hydrate🍊 snacks🧘 deep breaths💌 compliment a colleagueHow are you taking five?

We partnered with designer and creator Gavin Mathieu to develop Hardwear, a capsule collection of clothing and merchandise made for the creative in all of us. Prioritizing simplicity and function, these pieces are for those who remain true to themselves whether they’re fitting in or standing out. Go behind the scenes of this unique collaboration: https://msft.it/6006b2vNG

The digital transformation is here, and now is the time to develop frontline talent and future-proof manufacturing operations. Prepare your workforce for changing the industry with simple steps like:1. ⚙️ Explore the Microsoft Teams for Manufacturing website2. 📖 Address skill gaps with trainings3. ☁️ Design a sustainable, resilient future with the cloudhttps://msft.it/6049b2Hkh

Online safety is important, especially for parents. That's why Partner Technology Strategist Phillip Meyer used his compliance expertise to start ThinkUKnow Australia. Learn How Phil and his organization use education to empower caregivers and children to safely use the internet: https://msft.it/6048bFNPk

Not just a sci-fi concept, “smart cities” anticipate and understand the needs of citizens. Inside the increased efficiency, security, and sustainability of these digitally transformed hubs: https://msft.it/6049bIGV3
Psst ... mistakes are not setbacks, they're set-ups for growth. Pass it on.
Accessible mental health resources can be hard to come by, but AI is here to lower the barrier to entry. Inside Mental Health America's bot-powered intervention: https://msft.it/6043bI1Tt
We collaborated with steel manufacturer BlueScope to create a production process that’s more productive, energy-efficient, and better for employees. Here’s how: https://msft.it/6045bxVIT
Sawubona! 👋We’re supporting more inclusive learning with three language additions to Microsoft Teams, including Ukrainian, Somali, and Zulu: https://msft.it/6047btfdB
Make hybrid work for you with new tools for fewer distractions, smarter to-do lists, and easy switching between work & personal accounts: https://msft.it/6049btGDT

Our Microsoft Generative Chemistry team and Novartis are working together to help transform the drug discovery process. Learn about their new “MoLeR” model that’s leading to more efficient drug design: https://msft.it/6043bt15h

Eco solutions aren’t impacting all communities equally with low income and Black Americans disproportionately affected by the climate crisis. But innovative approaches are here to offer equity in the green revolution: https://msft.it/6042bsbJk
Did you know by 2030, Microsoft will remove more carbon than it emits? Go under the surface of our zero-carbon campus plan. ⬇️https://msft.it/6008boYN2

To solve industrial-sized problems, a quantum computing program must be able to scale up without losing speed or stability. Build for growth with the Microsoft Azure Quantum team as they break new ground in code architecture: https://msft.it/6046bo6kA

When Sydney Water deployed a new Business Experience Platform, they didn’t expect to reimagine company-wide collaboration too. Find out how Microsoft Teams powered their remote rollout: https://msft.it/6044bWNMa

Powered by Microsoft AI, the platform invites scholars and art lovers alike to find new and surprising connections between South Asian textiles in Bengaluru ’s Museum of Art & Photography and art found in the collections of museums around the world. Explore new paths through art and culture now. https://msft.it/6008bWU4p
Surf, snowboard, and ride. 🏆Learn how pro adaptive athlete Kiana Clay designs new ways to compete with Microsoft tech. https://msft.it/6007bY8ph

Giving drivers a holographic heads-up display with traffic information, weather conditions, and wayfinding—it’s not science fiction, it’s the HoloLens 2! Discover how we collaborated with Volkswagen to develop this previously-impossible technology:https://msft.it/6043bi9yS

How do you grow more food with fewer natural resources while boosting your bottom line? Explore the Digital Playbooks that use AI to deliver highly accurate crop predictions. https://msft.it/6048bczsu
Like this post if you think "no meeting Fridays" should be a thing. ✅
